entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saint Andrews
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 1:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
Temperature: 3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: ESE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with rain beginning in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over Grand Manan Island late in the afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
